cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP port for CU to a negative value (-1) will cause SCTP connection establishment failure between CU and DU, preventing F1 interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting PUSCH antenna ports to an invalid high value (99) will cause physical layer configuration errors and prevent proper uplink transmission setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PUSCH 天線埠設定為無效的高值 (99)，會導致實體層配置錯誤，並阻止正確的上行鏈路傳輸設定。
